DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , extension , Phase III study evaluate long-term safety efficacy MRA patient RA participate Study MRA213JP .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Treatment Study MRA Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) From Study MRA213JP
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Either MRA placebo administer least 3 time precede study , confirm problem respect safety . In case Patients whose participation current study judge inappropriate problem precede study respect safety , Patients must methotrexate dose group precede study . Exclusion criterion Administered drug infliximab , etanercept , leflunomide within 12 week administration study drug Evaluated belonging Steinbrocker 's class IV within 4 week administration study drug Have register 3 month full codebreaking precede study Were administer plasma exchange therapy initiation precede study initial administration current study Treated surgically ( except local surgery ) within 4 week administration study drug
